title: Ticket #2063: make clean fails to remove share/wsdl
description:
When rebuilding the externals after "make clean", cream will fail because externals/stage/root/condor_7.7.0/opt/cream/share/wsdl already exists. This can be a nuisance when you're working on the build system itself and doing lots of "make clean&&make". make clean should remove this directory.

To reproduce: 

make cream
make clean
make cream

On the second "make cream", the output looks something like: 

[  0%] Performing install step for 'cream_wsdl'
ln: creating symbolic link `/u/a/d/adesmet/scratch/master/externals/stage/root/condor_7.7.0/opt/cream/interface/wsdl' to `share/wsdl': File exists
make[3]: *** [externals/stage/root/condor_7.7.0/opt/cream_wsdl/src/cream_wsdl-stamp/cream_wsdl-install] Error 1
make[2]: *** [externals/bundles/cream/1.12.1_14/CMakeFiles/cream_wsdl.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [externals/bundles/cream/1.12.1_14/CMakeFiles/cream.dir/rule] Error 2
make: *** [cream] Error 2
